ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observation data of the lower troposphere taken by the transportable wind profiler (called LQ7) at Shigaraki (CSV format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The 10-minute average observation data in the lower troposphere (0.5-8.1 km) taken by the transportable wind profiler (called LQ7) at Shigaraki in Shiga Prefecture, Japan (34.86N, 136.11E, 385m MSL). The data are stored in the CSV (Comma Separated Values) file named (year)(month)(day).(variable).csv. The variable abbreviations are uwnd, vwnd, wwnd, pwr1, pwr2, pwr3, pwr4, pwr5, wdt1, wdt2, wdt3, wdt4, and wdt5, which mean zonal, meridional and vertical wind velocities, echo power and spectral width for beam 1-5, respectively. The azimuth and zenith angles of beam 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 are (0, 0), (0, 14.2), (90, 14.2), (180, 14.2), and (270, 14.2), respectively, in unit of degree. The numbers of the first line of each file represent altitudes, and the second and below are observational date and time (year/month/day hour:minute) which corresponds to the center time of averaging period (first column) and data at each altitude (the other columns). The value of 999 means missing data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire Shigaraki transportable wind profiler (called LQ7) data, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as Shigaraki LQ7 data provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

AccessURL.Name: Boundary Layer Radar (BLR) / Lower Troposphere Radar (LTR) / LQ7 Observation Data

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Atmospheric Winds Wind Profiles

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Description: Date in the form YYYY/MM/DD where YYYY= Gregorian Year AD, MM = month of year (01-12), and DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh:mm where hh = hour of day (00-23) and mm = minute of hour. Local time (UT + 09:00:00) is used for time data.

Parameter.Name: pwr1
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 1 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:0)

Parameter.Name: pwr2
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 2 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: pwr3
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 3 (azimuth angle:90, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: pwr4
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 4 (azimuth angle:180, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: pwr5
Parameter.Description: Echo intensity (arbitrary unit) for beam 5 (azimuth angle:270, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: wdt1
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 1 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:0)

Parameter.Name: wdt2
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 2 (azimuth angle:0, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: wdt3
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 3 (azimuth angle:90, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: wdt4
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 4 (azimuth angle:180, zenith angle:14.2)

Parameter.Name: wdt5
Parameter.Description: Spectral width (half power full width) for beam 5 (azimuth angle:270, zenith angle:14.2)
